name: pytchat v0.5.5
body:
## Enhanced
+ Made it possible to set customized httpx.Client (#50).
example:
```python
chat = pytchat.create(video_id="*********", 
                  client=httpx.Client(http2=True, 
                  headers=headers, 
                  cookies=cookies, 
                  proxies=proxies))
```

+ Added new chatItemActionRenderer (LiveChatDonationAnnouncementRenderer)

## Others
+ Add tests for fetching chat data online .

name: pytchat v0.5.4
body:
## Fix:
Fixed a bug that caused an Invalid Video Id Exception in some videos. (Issue #48)

name: pytchat v0.5.3
body:
## Fix
Fixed the bug (cannot fetch live chat data: #37 , #39) .

name: pytchat v0.5.2
body:
### Enhancement
+ `replay_continuation` paramter. Added support for retrieving and specifying the continuation parameter of archived chat data. (#31 , #32 )

name: pytchat v0.5.1
body:
## Fix
Fixed bugs that prevented fetching archived chats.

name: pytchat v0.5.0
body: + Fixed failure to load JSON. (#26)

name: pytchat v0.4.8
body:
+ Fixed bugs.
+ Removed some features (CLI, Extractor, VideoInfo).

name: pytchat v0.4.7
body:
### For development environment
+ Added pipfile (pipenv).

name: pytchat v0.4.6
body:
### Fix
+ Fixed missing data when converting chat list to JSON string.

name: pytchat v0.4.5
body:
### Fix 
+ HTMLArchiver uses temporary files to reduce memory usage.
+ Modified exception handlings when the chat stream finished.

name: pytchat v0.4.4
body:
### Fix
+ Fixed test data (DefaultProcessor datetime attribute)  (#22)

### Develop environment
+ Added GitHub workflow for automation tests. (#22 : thanks for [wakamezake](https://github.com/wakamezake) )

name: pytchat v0.4.3
body:
### Fix
+ Updated requirements.txt and requirements_test.txt

name: v0.4.1 released
body:
## hotfix
Fixed a bug that prevented the display of emojis when the first digit of the emoji ID was a number.

name: v0.4.0 released
body:
### New feature
+ Implemented a simple livechat fetching object. (`pytchat.create()`)

### Fix
+ CLI: Rendering emoji is now a little faster.
+ DefaultProcessor: Fixed an issue where the gap between the real time and the acquired chat time would increase over time. (at `sync_items()` function.)
+ Fixed an issue that video info could not be obtained in some cases.

name: v0.3.2 released
body:
## Fix
+ Stabilized error handling.

name: v0.3.0 released
body:
## Fix
+ Fixed an error when getting video information.
+ When a delimiter is not specified at the end of the directory with the -o option, add the delimeter automatically.

name: v0.2.5 released
body:
## Fix
CLI & Extractor: Fixed handling network errors.

name: v0.2.3 released
body:
## Fix
Fixed a problem with extraction not completing under certain circumstances.

name: v0.2.2 released
body:
## Fix
Retry to fetch data when failed to parse video info.

name: v0.1.9 released
body: + Update CLI progress bar - show progress of rendering.

name: v0.1.7 released
body:
## Fix
+ Fixed a case where video information could not be extracted correctly. (#17)

name: v0.1.6 released
body:
## Fix
+ Fixed requirements.txt for setup.

name: v0.1.5 released
body:
+ Replaced the http client with [httpx](https://github.com/encode/httpx) instead of requests / aiohttp. (#13)
The default communication behavior is now via http2. (Except in some cases)

CLI :
+ Show progress bar while extracting chats.
+ New option `--save_error_data`. If this option is specified, the error data will be saved as a `.dat` file when the error occurs. (CLI only)

name: v0.1.4 released
body:
# Fix
CLI:
Fixed an error in getting video information. (Issue #14)
Fixed an error occurring when specifying a url with video id.

name: v0.1.1 released
body:
## v0.1.1

### enhancement

+ Extracting video IDs from URL. (for issue #10)
You can specify a URL that contains a video ID to the `video_id` parameter, and the video ID will be extracted automatically.
This feature is also available in the `-v` parameter of the CLI.

+ Added [colors attributes](https://github.com/taizan-hokuto/pytchat/wiki/DefaultProcessor#colors) to Default Processor.


### fix
+ Fixed an unintended exception in some situations.

name: v0.0.9 released
body:
## Enhanced
HTMLArchiver  : Enabled to embed custom emojis in HTML file.
Chat Processors : Implemented `finalize()` function. When chat fetching finished, execute finalization process.

name: v0.0.8 released
body:
# Enhanced
The generation of initial continuation parameter is now about 40% faster than before.
New function `raise_for_status()` for catching the cause of chat termination.

name: v0.0.7.2 released
body:
## Fix
Fixed the handling of chat data when they do not exist.

name: v0.0.7 released
body:
## Fix
+ Compatible with new format of membership.
+ Process of termination on the multithread listener.

name: v0.0.6.6 released
body:
## Hotfix
Extractor : Retry fetching data when JSONDecodeError has occurred, (Issue #3 )

name: v0.0.6.4 released
body:
## New Feature:
Command Line Interface : Enable to extract archived chat data with one-liner command.

## Fix
+ Bug: when resume() is called, chat fetching process stops.

name: v0.0.6.1 released
body:
## New Feature: [Extractor](https://github.com/taizan-hokuto/pytchat/wiki/Extractor) : utility to extract chat data. [SuperchatCalculator](https://github.com/taizan-hokuto/pytchat/wiki/SuperchatCalculator) : ChatProcessor for aggregating superchat amount for each currency. [VideoInfo](https://github.com/taizan-hokuto/pytchat/wiki/VideoInfo) : utility to retrieve video information.
## Fix: Fixed implementation of [mupltiplying ChatProcessor](https://github.com/taizan-hokuto/pytchat/wiki/Multiple-chat-processors) when using callback mode.
Enhanced [JsonfileArchiver](https://github.com/taizan-hokuto/pytchat/wiki/JsonfileArchiver) (old name : JsonfileArchiveProcessor)
## Other Removed ReplayChat and ReplayChatAsync.
This feature has been already integrated with LiveChat / LiveChatAsync.

name: v0.0.5.3 released
body:
Hot fix :
- Fix fetching initial continuation
  - When 'seektime = 0' was specified or seektime param was abbreviated, some video did not return any chat data. In this version, pytchat gets  continuation as appropriate.

Other:
+ Fix duplicate logging output.

name: v0.0.5.1.3 released
body:
Modify Default Processor:
+ Make it possible to alert error when user misuses default processor's attribute.
+ Switch author type independent from platform language.

Modify logging:
+ Make it possible to set custom logger. (LiveChat & LiveChatAsync class)

Other fix:
+ Delete unexposed chat processor (json_display_processor).
+ Modify demo codes on README.
